column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Performers Anna and Milly onstage with fire umbrellas
#Text=What was the audience reaction to your show like ?

#Text=As we were performing on 2 small stages simultaneously , in the terracing , behind and to the either side of the main stage , we were quite a distance from the audience , so could n’t really gauge their general reaction…Those faces I could see down below , of the roadies backstage , were all smiles and waving fists of rock … .
#Text=We did hear back from a few people in the audience that we looked great from the distance and on the screen when we appeared on occasion .
#Text=They noted the massive fire and our choreography .
#Text=The stunt guys enjoyed our show and apparently Ozzy stopped to whatch us briefly as he moved towards the mainstage ! !
#Text=Just how much fuel did you get through , and at what cost ?
#Text=We had over estimated our fuel usage … better to have more than not enough I suppose .
#Text=We probably ended up using 8 litres of kerosene for each 15-20minute burn set .
#Text=So for 2 burns sets on 2 stages for 2 nights plus 1 rehersal each…Making that a grand total of 10 burns of 8L =80L at $ 4 L…approx. .
#Text=$ 320
#Text=About that. .
#Text=I did n’t do the figures or pay too much attention to how much we were burning. . but think that ’s a pretty good guess .
#Text=How has this event changed things at Flame Fire Productions ?
#Text=Flame Fire Productions has n’t really changed all that much as a result…by the fame I mean. .
#Text=tahaha has n’t really been any major influx of gigs as a result. . ! ! ?
#Text=But now , as a result of needing to invest in more & in quality gear for Rock2Wtgn , we have a mass of new and gorgeous fire toys and red hot pvc costumes…that do truly rock !
#Text=And some great photos and an awesome experience .
#Text=Do you anticipate a repeat of Rock2Wgtn ?
#Text=If so , do you feel you would get involved with that or a similar event again ?
#Text=It would be great to be involved in the same or similar event .
#Text=I love the idea of combining big Music gigs with other performing arts and dance … in one night events as well as music festivals .

#Text=Its awesome to work with other artists and organisers in creating events that surround , immerse the audience so they are embraced by the experience being communicated and received through all the senses , visual , sound etc ... . whether Rock or whatever ! !
#Text=What was your personal opinion of the bands performing ?

#Text=I find my personal opinion of the bands performing quite entertaining really…I never really realized or experienced the art of Rock theatre and I did find it both disturbing and comical as well as rocking. .
#Text=KISS were outrageous ! !
#Text=Their outfits ? !
#Text=The studs ! !
#Text=The boots ! !
#Text=What are they on ?
#Text=And that man 's [ Gene Simmons ' ] tongue is outrageous. . and what he does with it ! !
#Text=I was ooooeing and laughing and rocking my fist in the air. .
#Text=definately entertaining. .
#Text=Alice Cooper was also a little disturbing especially when it came to the hitting the lady dancer routine. .
#Text=did n't dig it … and the baby in the push chair ? . .
#Text=a clash of psycho & comic ... ?
#Text=althou I did like some of his lyrics …
